column4: Is there anyway to make my computer a wireless access point so me and some guys can play risk2. We are at university residence so we cant play through the network they have set up here?
if you flip the cards into ad-hoc mode you should be fine.
ok how would I do that under windows for the other guys though
if I turn it into ad-hoc mode do I hhave to turn it back to normal to be able to get on the internet?
wuts the command to turn it back
ok well is there anyway I can have my laptop as a wireless access point kinda?
yes, like I said, if you run in ad-hoc mode you can all connect to eachother.
ohh so only I have to be in that mode? not everyone else?
There is another way, with special drivers (which may not work depending on what hardware you have) which is far more convoluted.
ok well is there a way to do this under windows?
Ad hoc mode? yes. Just tell it to use computer-to-computer networks.
